Uses of Class
main.RandomEvents.RandomEvent

Packages that use RandomEvent
Package
Description
main.RandomEvents
 

  • Uses of RandomEvent in main.RandomEvents

    Subclasses of RandomEvent in main.RandomEvents
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AthleteJoins
    A RandomEvent subclass handling an event in which a new randomly generated Athlete can be added to the player's team for free.
    class 
    AthleteQuits
    A RandomEvent subclass handing an event in which an injured (0HP) player is permanently removed from the player's team.
    class 
    StatIncrease
    A RandomEvent subclass handling an event in which a random Athlete in the player's team receives a +5 bonus to Atk or Def.
    Methods in main.RandomEvents that return RandomEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static RandomEvent
    RandomEvent.gen(PlayerTeam player)
    Static method; generates a RandomEvent from one of the three possible subclass types.
